description:
Handa`s teacher plans to have his students dissect frogs, and Handa wants no part of it. But, as usual, Handa`s feelings fail to come across.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et la grenouille / Handa et le traqueur
Handa-kun and the Frog / Handa-kun and the Stalker
Handa-kun to Kaeru / Handa-kun to Stalker
半田くんとカエル / 半田くんとストーカー
